General.Name: NQ Minerals Plc
General.Description: NQ Minerals Plc operates as an exploration and mining company in Australia. It explores for gold, pyrite, silver, lead, and zinc ores. The company's flagship project is the Hellyer gold mine located in Tasmania. NQ Minerals Plc was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Surfers Paradise, Australia.
General.Address: 9 Beach Road, Surfers Paradise, QLD, Australia, 4217
